scripts.cover: mocha --require coffee-coverage/register --compilers coffee:coffee-script/register -R html-cov --bail test > coverage.html
scripts.lcov: npm run postinstall && node_modules/.bin/jscover lib libcov && cp lib/index.js . && coffee -cbo testjs test && SRC_REQ=../libcov node_modules/.bin/mocha -R mocha-lcov-reporter testjs | node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js; rm -fr testjs libcov
scripts.posttest: npm run docs && npm run cover
